item.title: Emacs Eglot Python config
item.description: How to config The config is very sample just show as below. Prerequisites One of the python server need to be installed, for example I chosed the pyright 1 $ pip install pyright Emacs Elisp 1 2 3 4 5 (use-package eglot :config (add-to-list 'eglot-server-programs '(python-mode . ("pyright-langserver" "--stdio"))) (add-hook 'python-mode-hook 'eglot-ensure))
